name: rsmc
description: Voxel-based Minecraft-style "game" in Rust using Bevy, with procedural terrain, networking, physics and client/server support.

name: tsmc2
description: Advanced TypeScript Minecraft clone using Three.js, WebAssembly and GLSL.

name: redmine_3cx
description: Plugin integrating Redmine CRM with 3CX via HTTP Basic Auth endpoint and configurable templates.

name: beertalk-workers
description: Slides repo for parallelising JavaScript applications in browser using Web Workers and Vue.

name: dotfiles
description: Configuration files for macOS, NixOS and Neovim, managed in Lua, bash.
